title: Andrew Yang, "Forward: Notes on the Future of Our Democracy"
description:
2020 Democratic presidential candidate Andrew Yang argues that America’s current economic & political systems are outdated & offers suggestions on how to transform both to address 21st century challenges. He’s interviewed by Rep. Eric Swalwell (D-CA).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
